CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Shipping_Provider__c, 'canadaPost'), 'http://www.canadapost.ca/cpotools/apps/track/personal/findByTrackNumber?trackingNumber='+ Tracking_Number__c+'&LOCALE=en', IF(ISPICKVAL(Shipping_Provider__c, 'purolator'), 'https://www.purolator.com/purolator/ship-track/tracking-summary.page?pin='+Tracking_Number__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Shipping_Provider__c, 'fedex'), 'http://www.fedex.com/Tracking?tracknumbers='+Tracking_Number__c, IF(AND(BEGINS(TEXT(Order.Type), 'GB'),NOT(ISBLANK( Tracking_Number__c ))), 'https://www.dpdlocal.co.uk/apps/tracking/?reference='+ LEFT(Tracking_Number__c,10), ''))))
CustomField.label: Tracking URL
